duckplyr 0.0.1
  • Reference

Lazily compute a set_union_all result on a relation object

Source: R/relational-rel.R
rel_union_all.Rd

TBD.

rel_union_all(rel_a, rel_b, ...)

Arguments

rel_a

a DuckDB relation object

rel_b

a DuckDB relation object

...

Reserved for future extensions, must be empty.

Value

a new relation object with the result

Examples

rel <- rel_from_df(mtcars)
rel2 <- rel_union_all(rel)
